result.title: Performance assessment of the real demonstration
result.description: This deliverable is the result of the activities carried out in Tasks 6.2 and 6.7. It will collect the evaluation of the real demonstrator through measurements and energy modelling, inluding analysis of possible causes for any divergence between measured and calculated results.

result.title: Business models definition
result.description: This deliverable will present different proposals of suitable business models that could support the commercialization of BREASAER project result. The deliverable will include also a summary of the result of the validation activities proposed in Task 7.5. The selected business models will be subject a “light” business plan (D7.17) that will also be a central part of the Exploitation Plan.

result.title: Documentation of functionalities – system specification
result.description: The list of functionalities developed with regard to i) the meta study of previous and ongoing projects and respective ICT-solution 1.0, ii) the partners expertise from previous projects, iii) the expertise from previous implementation of the project partner GreenPocket and iv) the Privacy and Security Advisory Board’s recommendations (see 7.4) is documented. Del 1.2 will serve as core input for the programming of the application and the system integration in WP 2.

result.title: Project Handbook
result.description: The reporting procedures, communication policies and set of templates to be used within the project will be included in the project handbook. The project handbook includes data protection guidelines and procedures on the collection, storage, access, sharing, retention, and destruction of personal data within the project.

result.title: List of quantitative success indicators for the evaluation of the performance of the ICT-to-Human ecosystem
result.description: The quantitative success indicators will be delivered in two ways: i) verbally described and ii) in mathematical algorithms. The field test (see WP 3) will be evaluated using this set of indicators. Del 1.3 is essential in assessing the (quantitative) effects the field tests in WP 4.

result.title: Report on findings of the multidisciplinary meta study of success indicators
result.description: This deliverable summarises the findings of existing projects related to PEAKapp’s objectives and reports them. It will serve as a reference for the developments and implementation of functionalities in Task 1.2.

result.title: Data Collection guidebook
result.description: The data collection guidebook will define i) the variables that have to be collected throughout the field test in order to being able to quantify the field test results (see WP4), ii) the variables measurement levels, iii) the frequency of the respective variables measurement and iv) possible data protection issues relevant for the respective variable.
